chapter.title: Financial management
chapter.para: The module financial management of membership enables you to monitor financial transactions relating to the library's readership. These may be of different types :

listitem.para: loans fees relating to one or more types of documents (for example, DVD), either as a whole, or based on the loan period...

Figure 9.1. Administration, Financial management
From this screen you can manage fines and suspension of loans.

sect1.title: Basic notions
sect1.para: How the financial management module in PMB functions rests on a number of factors of which you need a very good understanding to be able to use the module.

sect2.title: Types of readers accounts
sect2.para: There are three types of accounts for each reader :

listitem.para: A membership account : in which shall be recorded financial transactions relating to membership
A loans account : in which shall be recorded the dues regarding the loan of certain types of documents (DVD for example)
A fines account : in which shall be recorded the fines relating to overdue items as well as the settlement of fines.

sect2.title: The Library account
sect2.para: Similarly the library possesses an account that will enable it to manage in some cases the rebates on the readers accounts. La bibliothèque possède également un compte, qui permettra de gérer dans certains cas les remises accordées sur les comptes lecteurs. This account can never be in credit. It is just a debit account listing rebates. On no account shall it show a surplus. Ce compte ne peut jamais être positif. Il s'agit uniquement d'un compte de débit listant des remises. En aucun il ne pourra être bénéficiaire.
